original_text: The price was two-thirds of a shekel for sharpening plow points and mattocks, and a third of a shekel for sharpening forks and axes and for repointing goads.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 괭이나 삽이나 쇠스랑이나 도끼나 쇠채찍이 무딜 때에 그리하였으므로

sentences.original_text: The price was two-thirds of a shekel
for sharpening plow points and mattocks
sentences.korean_translation: 쟁기 끝과 곡괭이를 날카롭게 하는 데

sentences.original_text: and a third of a shekel

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 채찍 끝을 다시 만드는 데
